properties.entry: SELECT emp_id, emp_password, position_code AS positionCode FROM emp_info WHERE emp_id = ? AND emp_password = ?

SELECT ei.emp_id, ei.month_code, ei.compensation_status, ei.penalty_status, ei.penalty_score_sum, cm.month_name FROM compensation ei JOIN check_month cm ON ei.month_code = cm.month_code WHERE ei.emp_id = ? AND cm.month_name = ? ;

SELECT et.position_name, et.position_code, et.authorization_access, ei.emp_name FROM emp_info ei JOIN emp_position et ON ei.position_code = et.position_code WHERE ei.emp_id = ? AND ei.emp_password = ?;

select emp_id as empId, emp_password as empPassword, emp_name as empName, phone as phone, email as email, department_code as departmentCode, position_code as positionCode, emp_identification as empIdentification, payment_code as paymentCode FROM emp_info
INSERT INTO emp_info (emp_id, emp_password, emp_name, phone, email, department_code, position_code, emp_identification, payment_code) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
